name: FreeLore (Computing Coursework WIP)
description:
Okay right. This is the first (actually second but sure) prototype of my game for my coursework. This is the first game I've made so this has been a huge learning experience. I'll greatly welcome any constructive criticism, but I have been restricted by time and some things that I wanted to include haven't been included, purely for time/ability reasons. So I hope you find some way to enjoy it lol. I have the rest of the day to finish this so here's my list of things I want to include:

  • More dungeon items/accessible areas
  • Save Files
  • Bow and Arrow appear on player and can be unequipped
  • More bosses
  • Perfected game over screen
  • Health boost dialogue (or some other graphical prompt)
  • A story/instructions
  • More varied dungeons

Hope you guys enjoy! 

P.S. Oh and here's a list of elements that are kind of in the game but that I probably won't finish:

  • Operational bombs
  • A money system
  • An arrow system
